info.title: Rapid Search API
info.description: Rapid Search: Offering a better search experience to API integrators.

tags.name: Rapid Search Services
tags.description: The Rapid Search services allows the users to search properties for the specified property attributes and retrieve a list of properties.

post.description:
Allows flexible searching with multiple filters that utilise many different parameters and returns a list of properties. The default sort for this service is ascending by property address.

Advanced Filter Fields


are specific set of property features that may or may not be included in the response, depending on the features included with each individual property

Filter Field NameData type
categorySecondarySTRING
salesClassificationSTRING
wallMaterialSTRING
roofMaterialSTRING

200.description: Returns a list of the properties and relevant fields, such as hits and response time in milliseconds.

get.description: Allows flexible searching on many different search parameters and returns list of properties. The default sort for this service is ascending by property address.

parameters.name: addressComplete
parameters.description: The complete address, space separated and without commas, providing exact search function.

parameters.name: addressStreet
parameters.description: The street name of the property address (consists of street name, extension and direction)

parameters.name: addressSuburb
parameters.description: The suburb of the address.

parameters.name: addressTown
parameters.description: The town of the address of the property.

parameters.name: addressPostcode
parameters.description: The postcode of the address.

parameters.name: councilArea
parameters.description: The Council Area the property belongs to. This corresponds to LGA for AU and Territory Authority for NZ

parameters.name: addressSuburbTown
parameters.description: A complete locality consisting of the suburb and town.

parameters.name: addressStreetSuburbTown
parameters.description: The street name of the property address followed by the suburb and town.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude for a search by geo location

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: The longtitude for a search by geo location

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius for a lat/lon search, this field is mandatory for a geo-search. For an exact location, set radius to zero

parameters.name: baths
parameters.description:
The number of bathrooms. Use this to filter the matched properties. You can either pass the exact value or a range of values.
  Exact value - If you specify `baths=4`, the response includes all the properties with exactly 4 bathrooms.
  Range of values - If you specify `baths=2-5`, the response includes all the properties where the number of bathrooms is between 2 and 5.
  If you specify `baths=3-`, the response includes all the properties with 3 or more bathrooms.
  If you specify `baths=-4`, the response includes all the properties with 4 or fewer bathrooms.

parameters.name: beds
parameters.description:
The number of bedrooms. Use this to filter the matched properties. You can either pass the exact value or a range of values.
  Exact value - If you specify `beds=4`, the response includes all the properties with exactly 4 bedrooms.
  Range of values - If you specify `beds=2-5`, the response includes all the properties where the number of bedrooms is between 2 and 5.
  If you specify `beds=3-`, the response includes all the properties with 3 or more bedrooms.
  If you specify `beds=-4`, the response includes all the properties with 4 or fewer bedrooms.

parameters.name: carSpaces
parameters.description:
The number of car spaces. Use this to filter the matched properties. You can either pass the exact value or a range of values.
  Exact value - If you specify `carSpaces=2`, the response includes all the properties with exactly 2 car spaces.
  Range of values - If you specify `carSpaces=1-3`, the response includes all the properties where the number of car spaces is between 1 and 3.
  If you specify `carSpaces=1-`, the response includes all the properties with 1 or more car spaces.
  If you specify `carSpaces=-3`, the response includes all the properties with 3 or fewer car spaces.

parameters.name: landArea
parameters.description:
The property's land area in meters squared (m²). Use this to filter the matched properties. You can either pass the exact value or a range of values.
- Exact value
    - If you specify `landArea=300`, the response includes all the properties with exactly 300 m² land area.
- Range of values
    - If you specify `landArea=300-600`, the response includes all the properties where the land area is between 300 m² and 600 m².
    - If you specify `landArea=300-`, the response includes all the properties with land area 300 m² or above.
    - If you specify `landArea=-600`, the response includes all the properties with land area 600 m² or less.

parameters.name: yearBuilt
parameters.description: The year that the property was constructed.

parameters.name: landUse
parameters.description: The approved land use of the property. Land use filter that can include one or many values, comma separated.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort the results by these attributes and prefix with the sort direction (plus=ascending, minus=descending); 
multiple sorts can be separated by comma. For example, following the syntax &sort={direction}{attribute1},{direction}{attribute2}.  The last level sorts are -isBodyCorporate,address unless these are specified earlier in the sequence.

parameters.name: developmentZoneDescription
parameters.description: The council development zoning for the property.

parameters.name: isActiveForRentCampaign
parameters.description: Filter for properties where the last rental listing is less than 30 days ago.

parameters.name: isActiveForSaleCampaign
parameters.description: Filter for properties where the last sales listing is less than 60 days ago and no sale was registered 60 days before or after that date.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Property type filter that can include one or many values, comma separated.

parameters.name: subType
parameters.description: The sub-type of the property. This corresponds to the type and provides a more descriptive indication of the property type.

parameters.name: rentalLastCampaignLastListedPrice
parameters.description: A range for the listing price of the most recent rental listing campaign.

parameters.name: rentalLastCampaignLastListedPeriod
parameters.description: The period for the most recent rental listing campaign.

parameters.name: salesLastSaleContractDate
parameters.description:
Last sale contract date filtered by latest sale contract date.
This needs to be input in the format YYYYMMDD (ISO 8601 format without the hyphens, and it's inclusive).
For example, 20191201-20191231 will search for properties that have a latest sale settlement date from Dec 1, 2019 to Dec 31, 2019, inclusive.

parameters.name: salesLastSaleSettlementDate
parameters.description:
Last sale settlement date filtered by latest sale settlement date.
This needs to be input in the format YYYYMMDD (ISO 8601 format without the hyphens, and it's inclusive).
For example, 20191201-20191231 will search for properties that have a latest sale settlement date from Dec 1, 2019 to Dec 31, 2019, inclusive.

parameters.name: salesLastCampaignListedType
parameters.description:
The latest/last listing type for the property in the for sale campaign and refers to the way the property is being sold. For example, these include 'Asking Price', 'Deadline Private Treaty', etc.
o    Asking Price
o    Deadline Private Treaty
o    Auction
o    Enquiries Over
o    By Negotiation
o    Tender
o    Price on Application
o    Mortgagee Sale
o    Unknown

parameters.name: isForRent
parameters.description: Filter for properties where the last rental listing is less than 30 days ago.

parameters.name: isForSale
parameters.description: Identifies if a property is currently listed on the market for sale.

parameters.name: isRecentlySold
parameters.description: Identifies if a property has recently sold.

parameters.name: salesLastSaleSource
parameters.description: From where the last sale was sourced ("Valuer General", "Valuer General Confirmed",  "Agent Not Withheld" or "Agent Withheld").

parameters.name: rentalLastCampaignStartDate
parameters.description:
Last rental campaign start date filter range.
This needs to be input in the format YYYYMMDD (ISO 8601 format without the hyphens, and it's inclusive).
For example, 20191201-20191231 will search for properties that have a latest sale settlement date from Dec 1, 2019 to Dec 31, 2019, inclusive.

parameters.name: rentalLastCampaignEndDate
parameters.description:
Last rental campaign end date filter range.
This needs to be input in the format YYYYMMDD (ISO 8601 format without the hyphens, and it's inclusive).
For example, 20191201-20191231 will search for properties that have a latest sale settlement date from Dec 1, 2019 to Dec 31, 2019, inclusive.

parameters.name: salesLastCampaignStartDate
parameters.description:
Last sales campaign start date filter range.
This needs to be input in the format YYYYMMDD (ISO 8601 format without the hyphens, and it's inclusive).
For example, 20191201-20191231 will search for properties that have a latest sale settlement date from Dec 1, 2019 to Dec 31, 2019, inclusive.

parameters.name: salesLastCampaignEndDate
parameters.description:
Last sales campaign end date filter range.
This needs to be input in the format YYYYMMDD (ISO 8601 format without the hyphens, and it's inclusive).
For example, 20191201-20191231 will search for properties that have a latest sale settlement date from Dec 1, 2019 to Dec 31, 2019, inclusive.

parameters.name: salesLastSoldPrice
parameters.description:
The Last sale price search filter. You can either pass the exact value or a range of values.
- Exact value
    - If you specify `salesLastSoldPrice=375000`, the response includes all the properties with exactly 375000$ last sale price.
- Range of values
    - If you specify `salesLastSoldPrice=300000-375000`, the response includes all the properties where the last sale price is between 300000$ and 375000$.
    - If you specify `salesLastSoldPrice=300000-`, the response includes all the properties with last sale price 300000$ or above.
    - If you specify `salesLastSoldPrice=-375000`, the response includes all the properties with last sale price 375000$ or less.

parameters.name: salesLastCampaignLastListedPrice
parameters.description: The price of the most recent sales listing campaign.

parameters.name: titleReference
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the title document for the property. Can accept multiple title references, comma separated.

parameters.name: legalDescription
parameters.description: The complete legal description of the property as displayed on the title document. A title document can have one or many legal descriptions, comma separated.

parameters.name: ownerFirstName
parameters.description: Search filter by an individual owner's first name. Pass a full or partial name to return any matches or records starting with that string.

parameters.name: ownerLastName
parameters.description: Search filter by an individual owner's last name. Pass a full or partial name to return any matches or records starting with that string.

parameters.name: companyName
parameters.description: Search filter by company name. Pass a full or partial name to return any matches or records starting with that string.

parameters.name: isCurrentOwner
parameters.description: Identifies if an individual is the current owner of that property.

parameters.name: salesLastCampaignListedType
parameters.description:
The latest/last listing type for the property in the for sale campaign and refers to the way the property is being sold. For example, these include 'Normal Sale', 'Auction', etc. Normal Sale
o    Auction
o    Tender;
o    Private Treaty (new value added)
o    Expression of interest (new value added)
o    Rent (new value added)
o    Holiday (new value added)
o    Share (new value added)
o    Unknown  (new value added)

parameters.name: landUse
parameters.description: The approved land use of the property. Land use filter that can include one or many values, comma separated.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort the results by these attributes and prefix with the sort direction (plus=ascending, minus=descending); 
multiple sorts can be separated by comma. For example, following the syntax &sort={direction}{attribute1},{direction}{attribute2}.  The last level sorts are -isBodyCorporate,address unless these are specified earlier in the sequence.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of records requested per page and defaults to 20. A maximum of 50 records per page is allowed.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the zero based page index of the results. By default, this always returns the first page (i.e: `offset=0`).

parameters.name: addressParcelSuburbState
parameters.description: Filter for parcel description, which depending on state could be lot/plan, section/block or hundred

parameters.name: addressPlan
parameters.description: The plan number for the parcel. This is different to the survey plan which is per property.

parameters.name: addressSection
parameters.description: The section for the parcel.

parameters.name: addressHundred
parameters.description: A hundred is a geographic division which historically was used to divide a larger region into smaller administrative divisions.

parameters.name: addressParcel
parameters.description: Filter for parcel description without suburb and state, which depending on state could be lot/plan, section/block or hundred

parameters.name: ownerFirstName
parameters.description: Search filter by an individual owner's first name. Pass a full or partial name to return any matches or records starting with that string.

parameters.description: Identifies if an individual is the current owner of that property.

parameters.name: baths
parameters.description:
The number of bathrooms. Use this to filter the matched properties. You can either pass the exact value or a range of values.
  Exact value - If you specify `baths=4`, the response includes all the properties with exactly 4 bathrooms.
  Range of values - If you specify `baths=2-5`, the response includes all the properties where the number of bathrooms is between 2 and 5.
  If you specify `baths=3-`, the response includes all the properties with 3 or more bathrooms.
  If you specify `baths=-4`, the response includes all the properties with 4 or fewer bathrooms.

  Range of values - If you specify `beds=2-5`, the response includes all the properties where the number of bedrooms is between 2 and 5.
  If you specify `beds=3-`, the response includes all the properties with 3 or more bedrooms.
  If you specify `beds=-4`, the response includes all the properties with 4 or fewer bedrooms.

parameters.name: carSpaces

  Exact value - If you specify `carSpaces=2`, the response includes all the properties with exactly 2 car spaces.
  Range of values - If you specify `carSpaces=1-3`, the response includes all the properties where the number of car spaces is between 1 and 3.
  If you specify `carSpaces=1-`, the response includes all the properties with 1 or more car spaces.
  If you specify `carSpaces=-3`, the response includes all the properties with 3 or fewer car spaces.

ImageUrls.description: The property's primary photo, as a list of URLs for various sizes.

legalDescription.description: The complete legal description of the property as displayed on the title document.

LegalDescription.description: List of legal descriptions for each title reference of a given property

Location.description: The latitude and longitude of the property, as separate decimal numbers.

id.description: The unique identifier of the property.

addressFirstLine.description: The first line of the address of the property (not including suburb, state, postcode).

addressPostcode.description: The postcode of the address of the property.

addressStreet.description: The street name of the property address (consists of street name, extension and direction).

addressSuburb.description: The suburb of the address of the property.

addressTown.description: The town of the address of the property.

councilArea.description: The Council Area, LGA for AU and Territory Authority for NZ

baths.description: The number of bathrooms at the property.

beds.description: The number of bedrooms at the property.

carSpaces.description: The number of car spaces at the property.

floorArea.description: The floor area of the property, in m².

lockupGarages.description: The number of lock-up garages at the property.

siteCover.description: The footprint of the property, regardless of the floor area. For example, if a property is 2 stories high, it may have a floor area of 143m2, but the site cover will only be around half of that.

landArea.description: The land area of the property, in m².

landAreaIsCalculated.description: For all states excluding Victoria: government land area is returned if available; otherwise CoreLogic Calculated Land Area will be returned if available.For Victoria: CoreLogic Calculated Land Area is returned if available otherwise government land area will be returned if available.If land area data is not available, then this will not be returned.

landUse.description: The approved land use of the property.

occupancyType.description: The occupancy type of the property.

subType.description: The sub-type of the property. This corresponds to the type and provides a more descriptive indication of the property type.

developmentZoneDescription.description: The council development zoning for the property.

yearBuilt.description: The approximate year the property was built.

owners.description: Details of the owners of the property.

previousOwners.description: Details of the previous owners of the property.

addressUnitNumber.description: The unit number if it's relevant to the property.

isForSale.description: Identifies if a property is currently listed on the market for sale.

isRecentlySold.description: Identifies if a property has recently sold.

isActiveForSaleCampaign.description: Identifies if a property has an active sales campaign.

isActive.description: Identifies if a property is currently active

isForRent.description: Identifies if a property is currently listed as on the market for rent.

isActiveForRentCampaign.description: Identifies if a property has an active rental campaign.

isBodyCorporate.description: Identifies if a property is body corporate address

salesLastCampaignFirstListedPrice.description: The first listing price of the most recent sales listing campaign.

salesLastCampaignFirstListedPriceDescrip.description: The first listing price description of the most recent sales listing campaign.

salesLastCampaignLastListedPrice.description: The current listing price of the most recent sales listing campaign.

salesLastCampaignLastListedPriceDescript.description: The current listing price description of the most recent sales listing campaign.

salesLastCampaignDaysOnMarket.description: The number of days that this property has been on the market.

salesLastCampaignAgent.description: The agent for the most recent listing campaign

salesLastCampaignAgency.description: The agency  for the most recent listing campaign.

salesLastCampaignListedType.description:
The latest/last listing type for the property in the for sale campaign and refers to the way the property is being sold. For example, these include 'Normal Sale', 'Auction', etc. Normal Sale
o    Auction
o    Tender;
o    Private Treaty (new value added)
o    Expression of interest (new value added)
o    Rent (new value added)
o    Holiday (new value added)
o    Share (new value added)
o    Unknown  (new value added)

rentalLastCampaignFirstListedPrice.description: The first listing price of the most recent rental listing campaign.

rentalLastCampaignLastListedPrice.description: The current listing price of the most recent rental listing campaign.

rentalLastCampaignLastListedPriceDescrip.description: The current listing price description of the most recent rental listing campaign.

rentalLastCampaignDaysOnMarket.description: The number of days that this property has been on the market for rent.

rentalLastCampaignAgent.description: The agent for the most recent listing campaign

rentalLastCampaignAgency.description: The agency  for the most recent listing campaign.

rentalLastCampaignStartDate.description: Refers to the start date of the property's last rental campaign in format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

rentalLastCampaignEndDate.description: Refers to the end date of the property's last rental campaign in format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

rentalLastCampaignFirstListedPriceDescri.description: The first listing price description of the most recent rental listing campaign.

rentalLastCampaignLastListedPeriod.description: The period of which the price applies for the the most recent rental listing campaign.

salesLastSaleSettlementDate.description: Refers to the settlement date of the property (not the contract date) in format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

salesLastSaleContractDate.description: Refers to the sale date of the property (not the settlement date) in format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

salesLastSaleSource.description: From where the last sale was sourced ("Valuer General", "Valuer General Confirmed",  "Agent Not Withheld" or "Agent Withheld").

salesLastSaleTypeDescription.description: Categorizes the type of the transfer as received from the Actual - VG feed. For example: Love And Affection, Auction, Normal sale.

salesLastCampaignStartDate.description: Refers to the start date of the property's last sales campaign in format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

salesLastCampaignEndDate.description: Refers to the end date of the property's last sales campaign in format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

salesLastSoldPrice.description: The complete price in $ that the property sold for as reported by Agents Advice or the Valuer General.Note: This attribute may be restricted via Access Flags.If salesLastSoldPriceIsWithheld = TRUE and WITHHELD_PRICE access flag = TRUE, then this field will not be returned.

salesLastSoldPriceIsWithheld.description: Indicates if the sale price is to be withheld for the general public and on consumer portals or not.True = Sale price is only visible to professional integrators with the WITHHELD_PRICE access flag and can NOT be displayed on consumer user portals or products (e.g. PPR)False = Sale price is visible to all integrators.

titles.description: List of titles of a given property

valuationAssessmentDate.description: The date of the last property valuation assessment.

valuationReference.description: The unique identifier of the last property valuation assessment.

valuationCapitalValue.description: The most likely selling price at the date of valuation. The CV is also known as Government valuation (GV) or Rateable value (RV).

valuationImprovementsValue.description: The added value of improvements to the vacant land. This is calculated as CV minus LV. The IV is not an assessment of the replacement cost and should not be used for insurance purposes.

valuationLandValue.description: The most likely selling price of the vacant land at the date of valuation.

AuProperty.description: Returns a list of the properties and relevant fields.

hundred.description: A hundred is a geographic division which historically was used to divide a larger region into smaller administrative divisions.

lot.description: The lot number for the parcel.

plan.description: The plan number for the parcel. This is different to the survey plan which is per property.

location.description: Typically refers to town or region (e.g. Darwin, Alice Springs, Elliott). N.B. can reference a hundred as the known region.

displayName.description:
Displays the name of the parcel type. This will vary per State as follows:
- ACT: Section/Block
- NSW, NT, QLD, SA, TAS, VIC, WA: Lot/Plan
- NZ: Legal description

displayValue.description: A single line description of the parcel. To be used with the display name field which will provide the type of parcel, depending on the state this will either be section/block or lot/plan

isPrimaryPlan.description: Represents the first lot and plan numbers in the real property description. This is not applicable for properties in ACT. eg: Property ID: 1036739

Parcel.description: The parcel list of the property.

items.description: Filter permutations that match the provided filter.
